import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Row, Col, Breadcrumb, Badge, Dropdown, Button, List, Avatar, Input, Drawer, Typography, Switch, Tooltip, } from "antd"; import { IoMdLogOut } from "react-icons/io"; import { NavLink, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import styled from "styled-components"; import avtar from "../../assets/images/team-2.jpg"; const bell = [ , ]; const wifi = [ , ]; const credit = [ , ]; const clockicon = [ , ]; const data = [ { title: "New message from Sophie", description: <>{clockicon} 2 days ago, avatar: avtar, }, { title: "New album by Travis Scott", description: <>{clockicon} 2 days ago, avatar: {wifi}, }, { title: "Payment completed", description: <>{clockicon} 2 days ago, avatar: {credit}, }, ]; const menu = ( ( } title={item.title} description={item.description} /> )} /> ); const profile = [ , ]; function Header({ placement, name, subName, onPress, handleSidenavColor, handleSidenavType, handleFixedNavbar, }) { const { Title, Text } = Typography; const [visible, setVisible] = useState(false); const [sidenavType, setSidenavType] = useState("transparent"); useEffect(() => window.scrollTo(0, 0)); const showDrawer = () => setVisible(true); const hideDrawer = () => setVisible(false); return ( <> Pages {name.replace("/", "")}
{subName.replace("/", "")}
{/* */} e.preventDefault()} > {bell} {profile} {/* Profile */} ); } export default Header;
